title: Issues with server?
body:
Hi there.

Trying to log in but it just says authenticating. My friend gets into the client but he doesn't connect to chat and cant join a game? Anyone else getting this? {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
Hi folks

Looks like things are stabilising for many players at the moment.  Is there anyone who is still unable to login?

Cheers
Mindstar

Hi MrMushie

We're trying to get to the bottom of this, seems to be an issue for Telstra customers.

It would really help if you could perform a traceroute for me. If possible please run the below in a command prompt until it finishes and send the results to ocelivereports@riotgames.com

tracert lq.oc1.lol.riotgames.com > "%USERPROFILE%\desktop\Tracert.txt"

This should create a notepad on your desktop after it completes, it may take a little while. More detailed instructions can be found [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674#wq2).

Hi there.

I am entering the command but it isn't doing anything even after waiting it just creates a new prompt line?

That's fine, it is just working on the trace route (if the trace is having issues it may take a while, which is what we expect here). Once it is complete it will present with the standard starting line, like "C:\Users\USERNAME>" and it will have created a Notepad on your desktop called Tracert, which you can send to us via that email address.
It does that except doesn't open a Notepad.
It won't open it automatically, it should just save it as a file on your desktop background.
I'm also running the command and will email my results to you too. Thankyou.

Thank you, if you could also do one for the below URL that would be great!

tracert chat.oc1.lol.riotgames.com > "%USERPROFILE%\desktop\Tracert.txt"
I've sent in Tracert reports for the two IP addresses and the URL. Hopefully you can get to a solution!

I saw those come through, thank you :)

Are you still unable to login and if you can are you able to see your friends list and start a game?
I am able to do both now. Awesome work

All done :). Can't wait to get back on the rift!

Thanks heaps for your hard work.
Hi Juni, are you still unable to log in?
Oh yep it worked. And you want me to email it to ocelivereports@riotgames.com?
Yes please :D
Done :)

Is Agent Mindstar on the case yet? {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}


Side note, I can log in but chat won't connect...

Yep! Agent Mindstar is helping with the investigation, on his day off :(

Can you please run the below traceroute for me in a command prompt? It should create a notepad on your desktop called "Tracert" after it is finished. Once it's done send that file to ocelivereports@riotgames.com

tracert chat.oc1.lol.riotgames.com > "%USERPROFILE%\desktop\Tracert.txt"

Note that this is the chat URL not the login one.
I run Windows 7 if it makes a difference.

Hi,

I am recently having what seems to be the same problem now after the 8.15 Akali patch.

Do you want me to do the traceroute also and email it to you?
I am also experiencing this. I cannot login and I'm stuck on Authenticating.
